remark.en: MST program.　Only students of the MST can take the course. Class time: Fri 9:30-12:30.  Classroom: P101, IoP, AS. (for Chemistry Background students: Course content is Basic Physics)
remark.ch: 限中研院國際研究生院MST學程學生修習。五/9:30-12:30,中研院物理所P101 (for Chemistry Background students: Course content is Basic Physics)

goal.en: Advanced knowledge on nanotechnology in chemistry
goal.ch: Advanced knowledge on nanotechnology in chemistry

content.en:
"The topics to be covered:
1. Societal Implications of Nano
2. Characterization Methods
3. Fabrication Methods
4. Materials, Structure, and the Nanosurface
5. Energy at the Nanoscale
6. The Material Continuum
7. Nanothermodynamics
8. Carbon-based Nanomaterials
9. Chemical Interactions at the Nanoscale
10. Supramolecular Chemistry
11. Chemical Synthesis and Modification of Nanomaterials
12. Natural Nanomaterials
13. Biomolecular Nanoscience"
content.ch:

en.competency: Advanced knowledge in the research subfield

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現
